title: Hairy Bikers' spaghetti bolognese
description: The Hairy Bikers give us their simple recipe for a classic spaghetti Bolognese, a firm family favourite for decades.
ingredients: 2 celery sticks, trimmed and finely sliced
150g/5oz small portobello or chestnut mushrooms, wiped and sliced
1 tsp dried oregano or 1 tsp dried mixed herbs
salt and freshly ground black pepper
freshly grated parmesan cheese, for serving
